page.title: 11MUSIC IN SHREWTON SCHOOL
page.content: In our school we have a recorder group and choir. The recorder group play in assembly nearly every day. Sometimes the recorder children go to a festival at Devizes. We play different types of recorders like a tenor,a treble or a descant. At the moment the top group are playing a piece called Scarborough Fair and another one called, "O I did climb a tree-top" which is a German folk song. The choir went to the City Hall on December the 10th 1984 where they sang Christmas Carols. A few of the choir are also in the village church choir.
